title: 1945년 Stafford 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Stafford. 판결일: 1945-10-08. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Bartholemew L. Stafford v. Polar Steamship Corporation
**판결일**: 1945-10-08
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 269 A.D. 946

## 판결문 요약


Action to recover damages for breach of contract. Order granting defendant’s motion for summary judgment dismissing the amended complaint and denying plaintiffs’ cross motion for summary judgment and judgment on the pleadings, and the judgment entered thereon, unanimously affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements. No opinion. Present — Close, P. J., Carswell, Johnston, Lewis and Aldrich, JJ.
...
